#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>

int factorial_mod4(const int &n);

int main()
{
	char s[4];
	int answers[1000];

	const int ones[10][4] = {	{0, 0, 0, 0}, 
								{1, 1, 1, 1}, 
								{6, 2, 4, 8}, 
								{1, 3, 9, 7}, 
								{6, 4, 6, 4}, 
								{5, 5, 5, 5}, 
								{6, 6, 6, 6}, 
								{1, 7, 9, 3}, 
								{6, 8, 4, 2}, 
								{1, 9, 1, 9}};

	for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++)
	{
		answers[i] = 0;

		for (int j = 1; j <= i; j++)
		{
			answers[i] += ones[j % 10][factorial_mod4(j)];
		}

		answers[i] %= 10;
	}

	while (scanf("%s", s) && strcmp(s, "#"))
	{
		printf("%d\n", answers[atoi(s)]);
	}
}

int factorial_mod4(const int &n)
{
	int result = 1;

	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
	{
		result = (result * i) % 4;
	}

	return result;
}
